嶛字的基本解释

嶛
liáo
高峻：“剑阁虽嶛，凭之者蹶。”

嶛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáo］
［《廣韻》落蕭切，平蕭，來。］
亦作“嶛1”。
(1)高。
(2)见“嶚峭”。

嶛字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶛； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页319第47
【集韻】同嶚。【張衡·南都賦】其山嶛刺。【註】山高而相戾也。【左思·魏都賦】劒閣雖嶛，憑之者蹶。

嶛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嶛字的起名意思

暂无。

嶛
Basic explanation of words
嶛
liáo
Gao Jun: "Although the sword pavilion is awkward, the one who relies on it will be frustrated."
嶛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáo］
["Guangyun" falls off Xiaoqie, Pingxiao, come. ]
Also known as "嶛1".
(1) High.
(2) See "嶚Qiao".
嶛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶛; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 319-47
【Jiyun】The same wan. [Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu] Its mountain thorns. [Note] The mountain is high and Xiangying is also. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] Although the pavilion is stubborn, the one who relied on it is frustrated.
嶛
